mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mb_goods a
a.is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.factory_id LIKE concat('%',#{factoryId},'%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
